name: Fancy Navajo Tea Lattes: Homemade Almond & Pine Nut Milk
author: The Fancy Navajo
description: Today I will be sharing how to make Fancy Navajo Tea Lattes with almond and pine nut milk. It’s super simple and it’s the perfect fall drink. It will make you want to cozy up with a warm blanket and enjoy a warm cup of Navajo Tea with your own homemade nut milk.
ingredients: Navajo tea flowers or Squash blossoms
